body.name: CANEST Smart Bidet Toilet, Smart Toilet with Bidet Built in, Foot Sensor Operation, Blackout Flush, Warm Water, Heated Seat, Air Dryer, Digital Display(TC-100GE)
body.stockDetail: Only 20 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 13 hrs 2 mins
features: Smart Toilet for Bathroom：No more stumbling around in the dark! Our built-in LED nightlight offers a soft glow to guide your nighttime bathroom visits. The bidet toilet LED display makes the water temperature, seat temperature and wind temperature more clearly visible. CANEST smart toilet features off-seat auto flush, press knob flush, foot sensor flushing and remote-control flushing for your choice.

Instant Warming Comfort：Modern toilet with premium bidet feature, offers cozy and comfortable experience like warm seat, warm air dryer, instant warm water cleaning. The smart toilet seat heating function allows you to enjoy a cozy and warm experience when you sit down, Support 5 levels of temperature adjustable according to your desires.

Hygienic & Customizable Cleansing：One piece bidet toilet for bathrooms with self-cleaning stainless steel nozzles, It can be used for rear/ female/ massage cleaning, customize the cleaning method that suits you with adjustable water pressure, settings temperature and position.

Powerful Flushing - Siphonic Jet Flushing TECH：CANEST smart toilets with siphon flushing technology and pre-wetting function, ensures a powerful and efficient rinse every time, full & half flush (1.45GPF/1.08GPF) can save water and money; one-piece smart toilet product size: 26.5*16.8*18.7 Inch.

Quality Guarantee - CANEST toilet bidet are certified by UL and CUPC listed. CANEST provide 1-year warranty on all mechanical parts and bidet seat. Any problems with installation, function or quality, please contact us freely and we will respond in 24 hours. we offer free replacement for damaged or defective units (providing damaged photos, trouble videos and product barcode can be faster). We are constantly improving the craftsmanship and packaging to ensure that the toilets reach you intact.
body.description: Luxury Smart Toilet Introducing our state-of-the-art Intelligent Toilet, designed to enhance your bathroom experience with its advanced features and cutting-edge technology. One piece modern toilet has a high-definition LCD display, which allows the user to easily view and operate its various functions. This smart toilet is our star product, which is affirmed by consumers and the market. High quality, multi-functional, suitable for all home and commercial scenarios. Rear wash / Front wash /Mobile massage / Auto Clean After Use Foot sensor flush / Manual flush / Remote flush / Knob flush Seat / Water / Air temperature adjustable Bidet Toilet Pre-Wetting Powerful Flushing -Siphonic Jet Flushing TECH

Since its establishment, we have been working diligently in manufacturing top-quality kitchen and bathroom products. Blackout Flush Foot Sensor Flush Heated Seat & Warm Air Dryer Night Light & LED Display Off - Seat Auto Flush Luxury Smart Toilet Introducing our state-of-the-art Intelligent Toilet, designed to enhance your bathroom experience with its advanced features and cutting-edge technology. One piece modern toilet has a high-definition LCD display, which allows the user to easily view and operate its various functions. This smart toilet is our star product, which is affirmed by consumers and the market. High quality, multi-functional, suitable for all home and commercial scenarios. Rear wash / Front wash /Mobile massage / Auto Clean After Use Foot sensor flush / Manual flush / Remote flush / Knob flush Seat / Water / Air temperature adjustable Bidet Toilet Pre-Wetting Powerful Flushing -Siphonic Jet Flushing TECH
Multi-purpose wash by warm water The toilet has a variety of cleaning functions, including posterior wash, feminine wash, and massage wash, providing a versatile and customizable wash experience.

Bidet Toilet Pre-Wetting * Sensor Built-in Seat • Pre-wetting---When seated, a small amount of water(0.08GPF) automatically comes out to wet the inner wall, Easier cleaning of dirt when Flushing after use.
Powerful Flushing Siphonic Jet Flushing TECH provide strong flushing power.Siphoning before jetting keep the toilet cleaner after Use.

Enjoy cozy warmth during the winter months for a luxurious toilet experience. Automatic Flushing Say goodbye to manual flushing! The Smart Toilet's intelligent system detects when you leave the seat and initiates an automatic flush, ensuring cleanliness and water conservation. Tips: Automatic flushing can be turned off or turned on according to your needs Heated Seat Experience personalized comfort with the Smart Toilet's adjustable seat temperature. Choose from four different levels of warmth to suit your preferences, enhancing your overall relaxation. Air Dryer Indulge in ultimate comfort with the Smart Toilet's adjustable air dryer temperature. With four levels of warmth to choose from, you can enjoy a gentle and efficient drying experience.

One-Touch Knob Operation Blackout Flush：Emergency flush for power outages. Clockwise：Turn on the rear wash function Counterclockwise: Open the front wash function Short press: Open the flush function Healthy Bidet Toilet The seat is made of PP healthy material, Balancing comfort and health. LED Display & Night Light LED smart night light, perfect for children, the elderly or anyone who needs to use the bathroom in the middle of the night and automatically flushes and closes when leaving.

Electric Toilet Size & Accessories Product Informaition ● Product size：26.5*16.8*18.7 Inch ● Floor Mounted: Rough-in 12 Inch ● Flushing Mode：Siphonic Jet ● Drainage Method：Down-drain ● Rated Voltage：120V

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Canest TC-200GE vs Uncle Brown ST03 plus at install
reviews.reviewText: While the ST03 plus is an upgraded model with auto open/close seats I would like to discuss the comparisons in set up. plusI received both toilets at the same time, one for the primary room (ST03) the other for the second bedroom (TC-100GE). On opening the boxes it looked like the ST03 plus was more inclusive of needed materials. It contained everything except the tools. Items contained were t-value, remote, 2 AA batteries, wax ring, 1 9V battery, water measuring bag, mounting template, mounting bolts and nuts, washers and bolts. Canest contained remote, wax ring, angle valve, installation cardboard. However, batteries needed to be purchased separately..Uncle Brown’s while seeming more complete has significant problems. The T-value had unusual threads and was not useable on my set up requiring purchase of a t-valve. I saw other owners had a similar problem with their valves also in these reviews. Another issue was that I purchased this toilet because I want the emergency flush capabilities. It requires a 9V battery. The problem is, as other reviews noted removing the toilet cover is not an easy task and there are no videos or instructions on how to do it. Furthermore the last line in the instructions says: “If the battery needs to be replaced, it is recommended to contact your local dealer to have it replaced by specialized personnel.” So, is the new owner supposed to find someone to add the battery? Why can’t the company provide a video on how to add the emergency 9V battery. (None of the current videos offer any suggestions, although a few mention the 9V battery). I agree with other reviewers this need to be done.The Canest 9V is easy to install and easy to replace. The problem with this toilet was it required the purchase of a flange spacer as the toilet would not sit on the current spacer and allow the installation accessory brackets to be attached to it. Not everyone may have this problem. The angle valve on this toilet fits very well no unusual threads.Beyond these installation problems I really like both toilets. Yes the ST03 is a bit more upgraded then the Canest TC-100GE but both are great. I should mention that I decided to get the ST03 when it went on sale for Black Friday so it was only $100 more than the Canest.I really like my new bathroom experience and I wonder why these toilets were not in the US before.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Arrived with a crack, but Canest customer service is top of the line!
reviews.reviewText: We ordered this toilet. The original, packaged by Amazon , shipped and delivered by Amazon, I never even got to install…arrived with a huge crack. I was totally bummed out!!!! But then…Canest reached out to me! They have been 100% amazing! Like the best customer service I have experienced since COVID!Based on their responses and how they strive for excellence, I would absolutely recommend their product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great, nice setup, excellent customer service
reviews.reviewText: Straight forward installation. Works perfectly and is definitely a nice addition to the bathroom. Customer service is very helpful and unbelievably quick in responding. Would recommend!!!
